word_forms.definition_en: having features or a lot of information; paying a lot of attention to features or information

examples.example: The art college students were asked to write a detailed description of their favorite work of art.
examples.translate: 這些藝術學院的學生被要求對於他們最喜愛的藝術作品寫一份詳細的描述。

examples.example: Zushi Temple in Sanxia, New Taipei City is famous for the details on its walls and roofs.
examples.translate: 新北市三峽的祖師廟以其牆上以及屋頂上的細節而聞名。

examples.example: The weather expert explained in detail why he expected the next day to be very cool.
examples.translate: 氣象專家詳細地解釋為什麼他預期隔天會變得很涼爽。

word_forms.definition_en: a dirty or disorganized condition in a certain place

examples.example: A week after the typhoon left the country, many areas were in a mess.
examples.translate: 在這個颱風遠離這個國家一週後，許多地區一片凌亂。

examples.example: The teacher refused to accept Brian’s report because his handwriting was too messy.
examples.translate: 這個老師拒絕收Brian的報告，因為他的字跡實在是太亂了。

word_forms.definition_en: to share a feeling or idea using words, actions, artworks, etc.

examples.example: Lady Gaga uses music to express her view that people are different but equal.
examples.translate: Lady Gaga用音樂來表達她認為人們生而不同但同為平等的觀點。

examples.example: Freedom of expression means that we can say anything, but this should not include words that harm others.
examples.translate: 言論表達的自由意味著我們可以說任何話，但這並不應該包含會傷害他人的字眼。

examples.example: David wrote a poem as an expression of his love for his mother on her birthday.
examples.translate: David寫了一首詩，在媽媽的生日那天表達他對她的愛。

word_forms.definition_en: one’s ideas or views about someone or something, which may or may not be true

examples.example: In Cassandra’s opinion, borrowing books from the library is smarter than buying them because we usually only read them once.
examples.translate: 依Cassandra之見，從圖書館借書比去買書還要聰明，因為我們通常只會看一遍。

word_forms.definition_en: to compare two things by showing their differences

examples.example: The video contrasted a picture of a heavy smoker’s lungs with that of a non-smoker’s to discourage people from smoking.
examples.translate: 這支影片將老菸槍的肺的圖片和不抽菸的人的圖片做了一個對比，以勸阻人們不要吸菸。

examples.example: There are many contrasts between my two favorite movies; one is a light musical and the other is a serious drama.
examples.translate: 兩部我最喜歡的電影間有許多對比；一部是輕鬆的音樂劇，而另一部則是嚴肅的劇情片。

examples.example: In contrast with regular scooters, which use gasoline, Gogoro scooters run on electricity, so they are environmentally friendly.
examples.translate: 和一般使用汽油的機車相比，Gogoro摩托車是用電驅動的，所以它們是環保的。

word_forms.definition_en: something that causes fear, shock, or disgust

examples.example: It’s difficult for most of us to imagine the horror of war because we haven’t experienced it ourselves.
examples.translate: 對於大部分的我們而言，要想像戰爭的可怕其實是困難的，因為我們從來沒有自己經歷過。

examples.example: The kids watched in horror as the lions tore the deer to pieces on a wildlife TV show.
examples.translate: 孩子們很害怕地看著野生動物電視節目中，獅子們把鹿撕成碎塊。

examples.example: The whole world was shocked by the horrible news that the World Trade Center in New York was under attack.
examples.translate: 全世界因為紐約的世貿中心遭受到攻擊的恐怖新聞而感到震驚。

examples.example: It horrified Orlando to find out how much garbage is floating around in the ocean.
examples.translate: 發現到有多少垃圾正漂浮在海洋各處時，Orlando感到驚嚇。

word_forms.definition_en: the state of not having much knowledge or experience of the world, especially of adult matters or bad things

examples.example: The salesman was good at getting customers to buy his products because he had a look of innocence.
examples.translate: 這個業務員很擅長讓顧客們購買他的產品，因為他有一個純真的外表。

examples.example: The young travelers were so innocent that they didn’t realize they needed to lock their hotel room.
examples.translate: 年輕的旅行者是如此的天真，以致於他們不了解他們必須把旅館房間上鎖。

word_forms.definition_en: behavior or actions that are meant to hurt or kill a person or other living things

examples.example: Most people would agree that the use of violence against children is not right in any situation.
examples.translate: 多數人同意不管在任何情況下用暴力來對孩子就是不對的。

examples.example: The football player was removed from the game due to his repeated violent behavior on the field.
examples.translate: 這位足球員因為在球場上一再出現暴力行為，而被從比賽中剔除。

word_forms.definition_en: related to seeing or sight

examples.example: Debra loves all kinds of visual arts, including pottery, paintings, drawings, and films.
examples.translate: Debra喜歡各式各樣的視覺藝術，包括陶藝、油畫、圖畫和電影。

word_forms.definition_en: the process or state of air, water, soil, etc. becoming or being dirty

examples.example: This machine can check the level of air pollution in your apartment and help reduce it.
examples.translate: 這個機器可以檢查出在你的公寓裡空氣汙染的程度，並且幫助降低它。

examples.example: The seaside factory was polluting the ocean with poisonous chemicals.
examples.translate: 那間海邊的工廠正用有毒的化學物質汙染著海洋。

word_forms.definition_en: the act of letting someone do something, usually in a formal or official way

examples.example: Excuse me, sir. You need to get special permission for the video camera in the museum.
examples.translate: 對不起，先生。在這個博物館裡你需要特別的許可才能使用攝影機。

examples.example: When the seat belt signs are on, passengers on the airplane are not permitted to stand up.
examples.translate: 當繫上安全帶的警示燈亮起時，飛機上的乘客不被允許站起來。

word_forms.definition_en: the physical or mental energy required to do something

examples.example: Cassandra put a lot of effort into her science project and her teacher praised it in the end.
examples.translate: Cassandra很努力的做她的科學作業，且最後老師稱讚它。

examples.example: The father made an effort to get home in time for dinner, but he was still late.
examples.translate: 這個爸爸努力及時回到家吃晚餐但是他仍然晚到家。

word_forms.definition_en: a place and all the people who live there

examples.example: Leaders of various local communities are meeting today to express their ideas about how to clean up their streets.
examples.translate: 許多當地社區的領導者今天將聚在一起，來表達關於如何把他們的街道清理乾淨的想法。

word_forms.definition_en: to make a connection between two things or people in your mind

examples.example: Most people in Taiwan associate Beethoven’s “For Elise” with the coming of the garbage truck.
examples.translate: 在臺灣大部分的人都會把貝多芬的〈給愛麗絲〉和垃圾車的到來聯想在一起。

examples.example: In order to read, a person must be able to make an association between letters and the sounds they represent.
examples.translate: 為了能閱讀，一個人必須能把字母和它們所代表的音做聯想。

word_forms.definition_en: connected with or involving things that are against the law

examples.example: Studies show that better education can lead to a drop in criminal behavior.
examples.translate: 研究顯示，較好的教育可以導致犯罪行為的降低。

examples.example: The police are searching the community for a criminal who just beat up two people for no reason.
examples.translate: 警方正在這個社區搜查，尋找一位無緣無故就毆打了兩個人的罪犯。

examples.example: Taiwan has one of the lowest rates of violent crime in the world.
examples.translate: 臺灣的暴力犯罪率是全世界最低的國家之一。

examples.example: If you commit a crime, you may have trouble getting a passport in the future.
examples.translate: 如果你犯了罪，你在未來申請護照可能很難。

word_forms.definition_en: causing a lot of damage

examples.example: It is hard for most people to imagine the destructive power of modern bombs.
examples.translate: 對大部分人來說，很難想像現代的炸彈所具有的毁滅性力量。

examples.example: The strong winds completely destroyed the wooden fence around the farmer’s land.
examples.translate: 強風完全破壞了這位農夫的土地周圍的木圍欄。

examples.example: According to this report, air pollution could result in the destruction of many ancient pieces of art someday.
examples.translate: 根據這篇報導，空氣汙染有一天可能會造成許多古代藝術作品的破壞。

word_forms.definition_en: to be available, done, or produced in a certain size, color, etc.

examples.example: The T-shirt you are trying on right now also comes in white, black, and navy blue.
examples.translate: 你正在試穿的這件T恤現在也有白色的、黑色的和海軍藍。

word_forms.definition_en: to represent

examples.example: In the term WHO, W stands for “World,” H stands for “Health,” and O stands for “Organization.”
examples.translate: 在WHO這個詞當中，W代表著「世界」，H代表著「健康」，而O代表著「組織」。

word_forms.definition_en: only

examples.example: Mr. Rogers wants to have nothing but happiness and a lot of quality time with his family.
examples.translate: Rogers先生只不過想要快樂，以及與他的家人有很多好好相聚的寶貴時間。

word_forms.definition_en: to throw away, remove, or free oneself from something or someone

examples.example: Betsy asked her husband to get rid of all the disgusting rotten food in the refrigerator.
examples.translate: Betsy要求她的丈夫丟掉在冰箱裡所有那些噁心腐爛掉的食物。

word_forms.definition_en: regarding

examples.example: When it comes to decorating the Christmas tree, many families like to put a star or angel on top at the end.
examples.translate: 當談到裝飾聖誕樹時，許多家庭喜歡最後才把星星或天使放到樹頂端。

word_forms.definition_zh: 塗鴉（為集合名詞，亦可為複數名詞）
班克斯（英國塗鴉藝術家）
用塗鴉留下名字或某個表明身分的圖形
洛杉磯（位於美國加利福尼亞州，為美國第二大都市）
